title: "Academic Project"

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```
cat('
<html>
<head>
  <style>
    /* 隐藏所有课程内容，只有选择后才显示 */
    .content { display: none; margin-top: 20px; }
    /* 提供基本的按钮样式，使其更显眼 */
    button {
      padding: 10px 20px;
      margin: 5px;
      font-size: 16px;
      cursor: pointer;
    }
  </style>
  <script>
    // 切换显示的课程内容
    function toggleContent(courseId) {
        // 隐藏所有内容部分
        var contents = document.getElementsByClassName("content");
        for (var i = 0; i < contents.length; i++) {
            contents[i].style.display = "none";
        }
        // 显示所选的课程内容
        var selectedContent = document.getElementById(courseId);
        if (selectedContent) {
            selectedContent.style.display = "block";
        }
    }

    // 显示选定的 PDF
    function showPDF(pdfUrl) {
        document.getElementById("pdfFrame").src = pdfUrl;
    }
  </script>
</head>
<body>

<!-- 顶层课程按钮 -->
<div style="margin-bottom: 20px;">
  <button onclick="toggleContent(\'P8144\')">P8144: Pharmaceutical Statistics</button>
  <button onclick="toggleContent(\'P8140\')">P8140: Introduction to Randomized Clinical Trials</button>
</div>

<!-- P8144 课程内容 -->
<div id="P8144" class="content">
  <h2>P8144: Pharmaceutical Statistics</h2>
  <p>这门课介绍了药物统计学的基本原理和应用，包括药物研发中的统计设计与分析。</p>
  <button onclick="showPDF(\'pdfs/P8144_project1.pdf\')">查看 Project 1 PDF</button>
  <button onclick="showPDF(\'pdfs/P8144_project2.pdf\')">查看 Project 2 PDF</button>
</div>

<!-- P8140 课程内容 -->
<div id="P8140" class="content">
  <h2>P8140: Introduction to Randomized Clinical Trials</h2>
  <p>这门课介绍了随机化临床试验的设计与实施，包括控制组、样本量计算等重要内容。</p>
  <button onclick="showPDF(\'pdfs/P8140_project1.pdf\')">查看 Project 1 PDF</button>
  <button onclick="showPDF(\'pdfs/P8140_project2.pdf\')">查看 Project 2 PDF</button>
</div>

<!-- PDF 显示区域 -->
<iframe id="pdfFrame" width="100%" height="500px" style="margin-top: 20px;">
  This browser does not support PDFs. Please download the PDF to view it: <a href="">Download PDF</a>.
</iframe>

</body>
</html>
')
